aa75233a-86f7-4b0c-892c-a27b0fd2f72d:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"aa75233a-86f7-4b0c-892c-a27b0fd2f72d","title":{"en":"Transformers Animated: The Cool"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"トランスフォーマー アニメイテッド ザ・クール"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Transformers Animated: The Cool (トランスフォーマー アニメイテッド ザ・クール) is a Japanese comic written and drawn by Naoto Tsushima.   \nIt was serialized in Kerokero Ace, the first chapter debuting in the May 2010 issue. The Cool acted as a loose adaptation of its cartoon counterpart, primarily culling each installment's plot from an episode of the TV series and following the same general story arc.   \nHowever, The Cool deviated from its source material considerably on most occasions; while following the same plots and boasting the same resolutions as the cartoon episodes, its stories acted as a different means to the same end. Several chapters were completely original, as well.  \n  \n( Summary from TFWiki.net)"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"50880a9d-5440-4732-9afb-8f457127e836","name":{"en":"Mecha"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e64f6742-c834-471d-8d72-dd51fc02b835","name":{"en":"Aliens"}}]}

aa9305e8-1469-48fd-9a97-12923a9f1b47:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"aa9305e8-1469-48fd-9a97-12923a9f1b47","title":{"en":"Countryside General"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Inakappe Taisho"},{"ja":"いなかっぺ大将"},{"en":"The Funny Judo Champion"},{"en":"The Hick Judo Champion"}],"description":{"en":"(from mangapedia):\n\nKaze Ozaemon, who lives in Aomori, is the strongest boy in his village, able to throw even a rampaging bear with his bare hands. Surrounded by animals, Ozaemon lives a peaceful life until one day he is suddenly visited by Yagoro Ohkaki, a close friend of his late father, Jinzaemon. He tells Ozaemon to come to Tokyo to fulfill a promise he made to Jinzaemon, but Ozaemon, who loves the village, refuses to go to Tokyo.\n\nHe challenges Ozaemon, who says he is the strongest man in the village and has never been beaten by anyone, to a match. Yagoro easily throws Ozaemon to the ground with judo techniques, and tells Ozaemon that he is a frog in a well, and encourages him to go out into the world and experience more things. Impressed by Yagoro's words, Ozaemon vows to become a superstar and decides to go to Tokyo.\n\n---\n- **Won the 14th Shogakukan Manga Award in 1968, which it shared with Kawasaki's other serial Animal 1**"},"links":{"al":"154245","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/%E3%81%84%E3%81%AA%E3%81%8B%E3%81%A3%E3%81%BA%E5%A4%A7%E5%B0%86-%E6%96%87%E5%BA%AB%E7%89%88-%E5%85%A85%E5%B7%BB%E5%AE%8C%E7%B5%90%E3%82%BB%E3%83%83%E3%83%88%E3%80%90%E3%82%B3%E3%83%9F%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF%E3%82%BB%E3%83%83%E3%83%88%E3%80%91-%E5%B7%9D%E5%B4%8E-%E3%81%AE%E3%81%BC%E3%82%8B/dp/B00007CDR7/ref=monarch_sidesheet","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-30371","mu":"e6vogod","raw":"https://order.mandarake.co.jp/order/detailPage/item?itemCode=1159327519"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

aae147a2-1d29-4569-b828-81505e73730d:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"aae147a2-1d29-4569-b828-81505e73730d","title":{"en":"Onsenman"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"オンセンマン"},{"en":"Onsen Man"}],"lastChapter":"22","description":{"en":"(from mangapedia):\n\nThis is a story of the struggles of Onsenman who tries his best to relax the mentally and physically exhausted people of today by taking a hot spring bath. The author, Kazuhiko Shimamoto, says, \"Sometimes I want to make something funny and silly, something that is not hot-blooded\" but the story gradually becomes more and more passionate and grand in scale, far exceeding the original concept. \n\nA miracle happened to one of the hot spring eggs that was being made in Owakudani in Hakone, and the legendary hero Onsenman was born from inside. Immediately after his birth, Onsenman flew to Tokyo and suggested to Nami Katsuta, a student who had been skipping school to play at an arcade, to relieve her fatigue in a hot spring. Nami rejects Onsenman's suggestion, but Onsenman forces her to enter a hot spring.\n\nAt first, Nami is negative about hot springs, but she soon realizes their charm and becomes a fan. After witnessing this, the Onsenman flies away to heal the modern man who, like Nami, is also exhausted.\n\nThe first volume includes a behind the scenes bonus manga about the making of the story, and the third volume includes a secret story about the research trip. This puzzling enemy force has appeared frequently and without warning in many areas across the world. The weapons of the Neuroi mostly take on forms similar to propeller aircraft but their most troubling tactic is the spreading of a corrosive miasma. Not only do normal humans have no defense against this miasma, but the remnants of the land affected by it are processed by the Neuroi into new weapons, crumbling huge sections of former nations into the sea. As the miasma seems to be unable to spread across large bodies of water, humanity has designated such areas as their main lines of defense.  \n  \nIn order to bring out their potential for use in battle, each Witch equips a unique machine onto their legs: the Striker Unit. With the Striker Unit equipped, they gain the ability to fly and their tapped magical potential provides the strength to utilize weapons far too heavy and powerful for a normal man. Also created is a defensive field that can protect the Witches from the Neuroi's miasma as well as other physical weaponry, making them humanity's trump card in the war. With his dying breath, he casts the secret Spell of Reincarnation — when he next opens his eyes, he finds himself in a different world altogether, reincarnated as Seika Lamprogue, the son of a family of magic scholars!\n\nHe quickly learns that the magic in this new world is quite unlike the sorcery he learned in his past life and that he can’t use it. Fortunately for him, with his mastery of curses and the hordes of youkai at his disposal, he doesn’t need to. \n\nHaruyoshi (now Seika) is determined not to repeat his past mistakes in his second life by smartly laying low and avoiding flaunting his power. Yet accomplishing his goals and without drawing attention to himself proves to be easier said than done — will his powers be enough to live a happy life?! \n\n---\n\n[Official English Light No entanto, ele não é expulso do jogo à força. The atmosphere in the house is cold and stiff because the wife is having an affair with a younger man. The lonely master comes to look upon Vanilla as his own dear child. He suggests that when the sunflowers bloom, they go outside together to watch them. \"Is that a command, sir?\" asks Vanilla. \"It is not a command,\" he replies. \"It is a promise.\" And so forms the piercing and painful integrated circuit–the alternating current of intercourse–between a lonely old man and the emotionless Vanilla.  \n  \n-The Other Side of the Rose Wire  \nWhat was the thing a girl like an angel endlessly carried?  \n  \n-Fish Out of Water  \nA mermaid is brought out of her dream.  \n  \n-Mister Mineral  \nInside the body of a cute girl who's just like a doll… are internal organs, and blood, and…  \n  \n-Alive  \nThe sad tale of a human and a clone who pass right by each other."},"links":{"al":"30527","ap":"ic-in-a-sunflower","kt":"1207","mal":"527","mu":"7422"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}
